com.dhemery.victor.frank

Class FrankApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.victor.frank.FrankApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IosApplication

    public class FrankApplication
extends Object
implements IosApplication
    An application agent that communicates to an iOS application through a Frank agent.
